name: Ping Cog?
description:
Its a game for the Monochrome Game Jam

The theme was Cog and the colore palett must be monochrome.

In this game you are a cog, that got out of it's transmission and caused a spillage of Ping Pong balls in the game. 

Your only goal is to don't lose "your balls". NO pun intended

Now all the "little bugs" are fixed!

21:40 GMT+1
